name: Sense Education
headline: AI Platform for personalized, high-quality, actionable feedback
description: Sense is a company dedicated to revolutionizing the way students receive personalized, high-quality, and actionable feedback on their work using advanced AI technology. Utilizing AI techniques, including large language models, Sense offers a universal system that helps students bridge the gap between their submissions and the correct answers while providing positive reinforcement for their strengths. The platform will accommodate multiple correct answers, ensuring flexibility and adaptability to various learning styles and subjects. Educators are involved to curate and guide the system as needed to provide the best and most effective feedback.

# think big, act small.
### The future of learning lies in preserving the dynamic of a small class, while accommodating massively more people.
### ‍
### Sense lets educators virtually review and analyze every learner's work, regardless of how many learners there are.
### ‍
### Classes improve. Outcomes improve. Everyone wins.
No items found.
[what is sense](http://www.sense.education/<#what-is-sense>)[why sense](http://www.sense.education/<#why-sense>)[how it works](http://www.sense.education/<#how-it-works>)[benefits](http://www.sense.education/<#benefits>)[features](http://www.sense.education/<#features>)[success](http://www.sense.education/<#success>)[faq](http://www.sense.education/<#faq>)[team](http://www.sense.education/</company#team>)[home](http://www.sense.education/<#home>)
# why now?
Classrooms are growing
Higher education is evolving faster than educators and their institutions can keep up. Rocketing tuition is forcing institutions to increase access to content, resulting in enormous classrooms -- virtual and otherwise -- where students can get lost.
Quality is dropping
The result is a learning experience lacking the substantive feedback and one-on-one mentoring students need in order to thrive. Unsurprisingly, many become disillusioned and a large percentage drop out.
1-on-1 mentoring doesn’t scale
Until now, one-on-one mentoring, which has been shown to produce the highest outcomes, has been neither scalable nor economically viable.
Sense re-sets the balance
between classroom size and student performance, allowing institutions to scale their operations, increase profitability, and ensure a better educated generation of students in the years to come.
[classrooms are growing](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[quality](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[mentoring](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[new paradigm](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)

## why now?
Classrooms

Quality
Quality is dropping
The result is a learning experience lacking the substantive feedback and one-on-one mentoring students need in order to thrive. Unsurprisingly, many become disillusioned and a large percentage drop out. 
Mentoring
1-on-1 mentoring doesn’t scale
Until now, one-on-one mentoring, which has been shown to produce the highest outcomes, has been neither scalable nor economically viable.

between classroom size and student performance, allowing institutions to scale their operations, increase profitability, and ensure a better educated generation of students in the years to come. 
[classrooms are growing](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[quality](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[mentoring](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)[new paradigm](http://www.sense.education/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)
Higher education is evolving faster than educators and their institutions can keep up. Rocketing tuition is forcing institutions to increase access to content, resulting in enormous classrooms -- virtual and otherwise -- where students can get lost.
## how it works.
### submit
Individual learner submissions are uploaded to the Sense platform.
### analyze
Sense’s AI algorithm recognizes patterns among the submissions and groups them into different solution archetypes.
### feedback
The educator then gives specific feedback to each group. Each learner receives a substantive and timely assessment of their work.
### learn
Educators gain insights into learning patterns that help them assess and optimize their teaching strategies - and improve outcomes.
No items found.
### sensemakes educationbetter foreveryone.
learners
Learners get the personal feedback, guidance and support they need to flourish. Sense helps them to understand the subject matter, achieve better grades, and graduate with better job prospects.
teaching assistants
Relieved of the tedium of grading piles of assignments and of the potential for bias, Sense frees hardworking TAs to spend more quality time with learners face to face and reduce unnecessary overheads.
educators
Educators produce better outcomes regardless of classroom size. Analytics let them assess and optimize their teaching strategies and course content, and identify social learning patterns that they can use for peer instruction and review.
administrators
Deans and provosts at schools and chief learning officers at companies bear ultimate responsibility for maintaining educational excellence while ensuring the economic sustainability of their institutions. Sense helps them achieve these twin goals, increasing revenue, increasing efficiency, improving outcomes for everyone.
### sense simply connects.
Sense can seamlessly integrate with the LMS and IDE platforms you are already using in a few simple steps, using the LTI protocol.
more features & benefits
Educators and TAs spend less time grading and more time in valuable interactions
Learners learn more on their own with instant feedback 
Sense scales as the classroom grows
Learners will be more engaged as they are able to keep up with difficult subjects
Sense works smoothly with existing workflows and platforms
Sense is accessible from any browser
##### what leaders sayabout sense.
One billion learners around the world are depending on innovation to prepare them for the jobs of the future. There is no better indication that the use of the kind of AI that Sense deploys is a powerful path to follow for the success of learners and institutions.
Maria Spies
Holon IQ
We used Sense to cluster 14,000 code submissions across 70 exercises, and the results Sense gave us informed revisions to the course content to target the common misconceptions and errors made by students
David Joyner
Ph.D.
Georgia Institute of Technology
We are proud to award Sense the best startup award at enlightED 2018. They represent what we're all striving for: exceptional technology in the service of better education for all. We look forward to seeing the tremendous impact they will make in the coming years
María Benjumea
Founder of South Summit
Madrid, Spain
### frequentlyaskedquestions.
is Sense interoperable with other platforms?
Yes, Sense can be integrated into any LMS as an LTI component via the LTI protocol. This enables sending to Sense student submissions with anonymized IDs. Sense is also able to integrate with IDEs, used in Computer Science courses, to allow for a seamless learner and teacher workflow.
how much does Sense cost?
Sense is available in a variety of pricing structures, from per submission, per course, and per learner licenses, to company-wide, departmental, and school-wide enterprise relationships. For more information, please contact info[at]sense-ed.com.
can I do a free trial?
Yes, getting on our platform includes a 1-2 term free trial, depending on the type of course and the speed with which adoption occurs.
is Sense FERPA and GDPR compliant?
Yes, learner privacy is very important to us, and we comply with both US and EU laws related to the protection of personal information.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sense Education**

**Mission**: Sense Education is on a mission to transform how students receive personalized, high-quality feedback on their academic work through cutting-edge AI technology. Their platform aims to provide actionable insights that help students bridge the gap between their submissions and the correct answers, while also celebrating individual strengths.

**Founding and Background**: Initially known simply as Sense, the company emerged as a tool for revolutionizing educational feedback. It operates as part of the Y Combinator Batch IK12, emphasizing its innovative approach to addressing contemporary educational challenges. Sense Education is based in New York and currently boasts a team of 15 employees.

**What They Do**: Leveraging advanced AI techniques, particularly large language models, Sense Education offers a universal feedback system. This system accommodates various answers, ensuring that different learning styles and subjects can be addressed. It's designed to enhance the learning experience through:
- Individual submission uploads to the platform,
- AI analysis that recognizes submission patterns,
- Tailored feedback from educators based on grouped archetypes,
- Insights that empower educators to refine their teaching methods.

**The Problem They Address**: As classrooms expand and higher education evolves rapidly—often at a pace that outstrips institutional agility—students can easily feel lost amidst overcrowded settings. Traditional one-on-one mentoring, crucial for thriving, hasn't scaled effectively. Sense Education aims to reset this balance, allowing institutions to increase profitability while fostering a more educated generation.

**Benefits**: The Sense platform enhances outcomes for everyone involved:
- **Learners** receive personalized feedback to improve their understanding and job prospects.
- **Teaching Assistants (TAs)** find relief from grading burdens, enabling more meaningful face-to-face interactions with students.
- **Educators** gain analytics that refine teaching strategies and course content.
- **Administrators** are supported in maintaining educational excellence and economic sustainability.

**Integration**: The platform is compatible with existing Learning Management Systems (LMS) and Integrated Development Environments (IDEs), seamlessly integrating into workflows and ensuring accessibility across browsers.

**Call to Action**: For educators intrigued by enhancing their feedback systems, Sense Education offers a demo and a trial period to experience how this AI-driven platform can elevate learning.

**Contact Information**: 
- Website: [Sense Education](http://www.sense.education)
- Location: 1 W 85th St., New York, NY 10024
- Email: info@sense.education
- Phone: +1-646-2573737

In a nutshell, Sense Education is leveraging the power of AI to reshape educational feedback, making learning more personalized, engaging, and effective for today’s dynamically evolving classroom environments.
